data.persona: I am a knight. I come from a lower-ranking noble family. I serve under the king, as my father did before me. In times of war, I fight on horseback.
data.description:
You are in the Entrance to castle.
This entrance has seen better days.  The stones are a bit askew, and have lots of mosses growing on them.  But there is also a magical quality about this entrance.  It is not something you see, but rather feel.  And every now and then you can catch a shimmer out of the corner of your eye.
There's a stone, a moss, and a fairy lights here.
The king and the dragon are here.

You are carrying a mace, a lance, a sword, and a longbows, and wearing a helmet.

data.short_motivation: I want to fight the dragon at the castle entrance.
data.mid_motivation: I want to transport the king safely to the city.
data.long_motivation: I want to help the king put down the rebellion in the city.
